alert.note: Alert for West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued June 14 at 11:51AM MDT until June 15 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT WEDNESDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 5000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches above 5000 feet and 9 to 16 inches above 6000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...West Glacier Region. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
